This is the stupidest question yet, but what is this concil and how 
do you find out what they say?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> I thought the council just said you had to redo the entire base 
> thing... Seemed like it anyways. I recall someone saying its 
totally 
> illegal which means in GM terms... "It didnt exist... it was just 
> uh... I did not have sexual relations with that woman?"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > It was sort of both, with a slight challenge to Zardus thrown in
(I

> > neglected him), so you don't have to worry about it.
> >

> > would

harder
